mapper.sql: id as id, site_id as siteId, title as title, user_id as userId, check_user_id as checkUserId, category_id as categoryId, model_id as modelId, parent_id as parentId, copied as copied, author as author, editor as editor, only_url as onlyUrl, has_images as hasImages, has_files as hasFiles, has_static as hasStatic, url as url, description as description, tag_ids as tagIds, cover as cover, comments as comments, clicks as clicks, publish_date as publishDate, check_date as checkDate, sortno as sortno, status as status, memo as memo, dstatus as dstatus, creator as creator, create_date as createDate, last_modifier as lastModifier, last_mod_date as lastModDate, version as version
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM cms_content WHERE id = #{id} for update

SELECT
FROM cms_content
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.id} , '%')
AND site_id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.siteId} , '%')
AND title like CONCAT('%', #{condition.title} , '%')
AND user_id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.userId} , '%')
AND check_user_id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.checkUserId} , '%')
AND category_id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.categoryId} , '%')
AND model_id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.modelId} , '%')
AND parent_id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.parentId} , '%')
AND copied like CONCAT('%', #{condition.copied} , '%')
AND author like CONCAT('%', #{condition.author} , '%')
AND editor like CONCAT('%', #{condition.editor} , '%')
AND only_url like CONCAT('%', #{condition.onlyUrl} , '%')
AND has_images like CONCAT('%', #{condition.hasImages} , '%')
AND has_files like CONCAT('%', #{condition.hasFiles} , '%')
AND has_static like CONCAT('%', #{condition.hasStatic} , '%')
AND url like CONCAT('%', #{condition.url} , '%')
AND description like CONCAT('%', #{condition.description} , '%')
AND tag_ids like CONCAT('%', #{condition.tagIds} , '%')
AND cover like CONCAT('%', #{condition.cover} , '%')
AND comments like CONCAT('%', #{condition.comments} , '%')
AND clicks like CONCAT('%', #{condition.clicks} , '%')
AND publish_date like CONCAT('%', #{condition.publishDate} , '%')
AND check_date like CONCAT('%', #{condition.checkDate} , '%')
AND sortno like CONCAT('%', #{condition.sortno} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{condition.status} , '%')
AND memo like CONCAT('%', #{condition.memo} , '%')
AND dstatus like CONCAT('%', #{condition.dstatus} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{condition.creator} , '%')
AND create_date like CONCAT('%', #{condition.createDate} , '%')
AND last_modifier like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModifier} , '%')
AND last_mod_date like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModDate} , '%')
AND version like CONCAT('%', #{condition.version} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
limit ${offset}, ${rows}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cms_content ( id, site_id, title, user_id, check_user_id, category_id, model_id, parent_id, copied, author, editor, only_url, has_images, has_files, has_static, url, description, tag_ids, cover, comments, clicks, publish_date, check_date, sortno, status, memo, dstatus, creator, create_date, last_modifier, last_mod_date, version ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{siteId}, #{title}, #{userId}, #{checkUserId}, #{categoryId}, #{modelId}, #{parentId}, #{copied}, #{author}, #{editor}, #{onlyUrl}, #{hasImages}, #{hasFiles}, #{hasStatic}, #{url}, #{description}, #{tagIds}, #{cover}, #{comments}, #{clicks}, #{publishDate}, #{checkDate}, #{sortno}, #{status}, #{memo}, #{dstatus}, #{creator}, #{createDate}, #{lastModifier}, #{lastModDate}, #{version} )

INSERT INTO cms_content ( id, site_id, title, user_id, check_user_id, category_id, model_id, parent_id, copied, author, editor, only_url, has_images, has_files, has_static, url, description, tag_ids, cover, comments, clicks, publish_date, check_date, sortno, status, memo, dstatus, creator, create_date, last_modifier, last_mod_date, version ) VALUES ( #{item.id}, #{item.siteId}, #{item.title}, #{item.userId}, #{item.checkUserId}, #{item.categoryId}, #{item.modelId}, #{item.parentId}, #{item.copied}, #{item.author}, #{item.editor}, #{item.onlyUrl}, #{item.hasImages}, #{item.hasFiles}, #{item.hasStatic}, #{item.url}, #{item.description}, #{item.tagIds}, #{item.cover}, #{item.comments}, #{item.clicks}, #{item.publishDate}, #{item.checkDate}, #{item.sortno}, #{item.status}, #{item.memo}, #{item.dstatus}, #{item.creator}, #{item.createDate}, #{item.lastModifier}, #{item.lastModDate}, #{item.version} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE cms_content
site_id = #{siteId},
title = #{title},
user_id = #{userId},
check_user_id = #{checkUserId},
category_id = #{categoryId},
model_id = #{modelId},
parent_id = #{parentId},
copied = #{copied},
author = #{author},
editor = #{editor},
only_url = #{onlyUrl},
has_images = #{hasImages},
has_files = #{hasFiles},
has_static = #{hasStatic},
url = #{url},
description = #{description},
tag_ids = #{tagIds},
cover = #{cover},
comments = #{comments},
clicks = #{clicks},
publish_date = #{publishDate},
check_date = #{checkDate},
sortno = #{sortno},
status = #{status},
memo = #{memo},
dstatus = #{dstatus},
creator = #{creator},
create_date = #{createDate},
last_modifier = #{lastModifier},
last_mod_date = #{lastModDate},
version = #{version},
WHERE id = #{id}
